name: Docker Compose - ELK Stack
description: Elasticsearch + Kibana + Logstash の開発用スタック（簡易）。

files.template:
version: '3.9'
services:
  elastic:
    image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:8.14.0
    environment: ["discovery.type=single-node", "xpack.security.enabled=false"]
    ports: ['9200:9200']
  kibana:
    image: docker.elastic.co/kibana/kibana:8.14.0
    environment: ["ELASTICSEARCH_HOSTS=http://elastic:9200"]
    ports: ['5601:5601']
    depends_on: [elastic]
  logstash:
    image: docker.elastic.co/logstash/logstash:8.14.0
    ports: ['5044:5044']
    depends_on: [elastic]
